Package roads

Class Road

  • java.lang.Object
    • roads.Road
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CountryRoad, ExpressRoad, HighwayRoad
    public class Road
extends java.lang.Object
    The Road is the parent class for all types of roads from package=src/roads . This class represent the the path from one location to another. He has 4 private members which describe : "length" which must be less than the euclidean distance between the location coordinates. "speed limit" and these 2 locations between which there is this road .

        The constructor of Road class which has 4 parameters
        Parameters:
        length - should not be less than the euclidean distance between the location coordinates.
        location1 - specify the start/end location.
        location2 - specify the start/end location.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if the length param is less than the euclidean distance and if the locations param are the same .
